thread.title: VIDEO: Cecily Strong & Sasheer Zamata Sing a Goodbye to Obama on 'SNL'
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Cecily Strong & Sasheer Zamata Sing a Goodbye to Obama on 'SNL'

author: Just Jared
title: VIDEO: Cecily Strong & Sasheer Zamata Sing a Goodbye to Obama on 'SNL'
text:
The first episode of Saturday Night Live to take place during Donald Trump ‘s presidency featured a farewell to President Obama at the end of the night.
Cecily Strong and Sasheer Zamata sang an emotional version of the classic song “To Sir With Love” while a black and white photo of Obama was projected on a screen behind them.
Cecily hosted the White House Correspondents’ Dinner in 2015 and she took to her Instagram account the other day to remember the moment.
“One of the best moments of my life. Getting to sort of start to begin to try and thank this hero. As messy and awful and stupid and ugly and violent and deadly and embarrassing and idiotic as things can sometimes feel- I’m still so proud to be part of a country that produces families and people like the Obamas. Thank you for making this a better country and making me a better person,” C ecily said.
